concepts.name: addition
concepts.description: Combining two or more numbers to find the total or sum.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to add two numbers together using simple examples.

concepts.name: subtraction
concepts.description: Finding the difference between two numbers by taking one away from another.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe subtraction using a real-life example.

concepts.name: multiplication
concepts.description: Repeated addition of the same number a certain number of times.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain multiplication in simple terms with an example.

concepts.name: division
concepts.description: Splitting a number into equal parts or groups.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe division using a simple word problem.

concepts.name: place value
concepts.description: Understanding the value of each digit in a number based on its position.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain what place value means with an example number.

concepts.name: fractions
concepts.description: A way of showing part of a whole, written as one number over another.
concepts.aiPrompt: Introduce the idea of fractions using a simple visual.

concepts.name: equivalent fractions
concepts.description: Different fractions that represent the same value or part of a whole.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain what equivalent fractions are using a pizza example.

concepts.name: area
concepts.description: The amount of space a shape covers, measured in square units.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe how to find the area of a rectangle.

concepts.name: perimeter
concepts.description: The total distance around the edges of a shape.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to calculate the perimeter of a square.

concepts.name: geometry
concepts.description: The study of shapes, sizes, and the properties of space.
concepts.aiPrompt: Introduce basic 2D shapes and their names.

concepts.name: time
concepts.description: Measuring and telling time using clocks and calendars.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to read an analog clock.

concepts.name: measurement
concepts.description: Finding the size, length, or amount of something using standard units.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe how to measure the length of an object.

concepts.name: rounding
concepts.description: Changing a number to a nearby value that is easier to work with.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to round a number to the nearest ten.

concepts.name: estimation
concepts.description: A quick way of finding a value that is close enough to the right answer.
concepts.aiPrompt: Show how to estimate a sum using rounding.

concepts.name: patterns
concepts.description: Repeating sequences of numbers, shapes, or colors that follow a rule.
concepts.aiPrompt: Give an example of a number pattern and ask what comes next.

concepts.name: arrays
concepts.description: A way to show multiplication using rows and columns of objects.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain what an array is in math using dots or objects.

concepts.name: skip counting
concepts.description: Counting forward by numbers other than 1, like 2s, 5s, or 10s.
concepts.aiPrompt: Show how skip counting by 5 works up to 50.

concepts.name: angles
concepts.description: A figure formed by two rays meeting at a point, measured in degrees.
concepts.aiPrompt: Introduce right, acute, and obtuse angles with simple drawings.

concepts.name: remainder
concepts.description: The amount left over after dividing a number that doesn't divide evenly.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain what a remainder is with a simple division problem.

concepts.name: simplifying
concepts.description: Making a fraction as simple as possible by dividing the top and bottom by the same number.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to simplify 4/8 to its simplest form.

concepts.name: common denominators
concepts.description: A shared bottom number in two or more fractions, used to compare or add them.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe how to find a common denominator for 1/2 and 1/3.

concepts.name: decimals
concepts.description: A way of writing numbers that are less than one using a dot.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain what a decimal is and how it's like a fraction.

concepts.name: number sense
concepts.description: Understanding numbers and how they relate to each other, including size, order, and patterns.
concepts.aiPrompt: Describe what number sense means and give a simple example.

concepts.name: comparison
concepts.description: Looking at two numbers or amounts to decide which is bigger, smaller, or if they are equal.
concepts.aiPrompt: Show how to compare 456 and 465 using place value.

concepts.name: elapsed time
concepts.description: The amount of time that passes from the start to the end of an event.
concepts.aiPrompt: Explain how to figure out elapsed time between 2:00 PM and 3:30 PM.
